subject: Web3
title: Self-Sovereign Identity
description: A quick, practical guide to Self-Sovereign Identity.

hook.text: Your identity data is scattered across hundreds of companies. Self-sovereign identity puts you back in control.

buildup.text: Instead of companies storing your data, you hold verifiable credentials in a digital wallet that only you control.

discovery.text: When a service needs your age, you prove it without revealing your birthday, name, or address.

twist.text: Tech giants like Google and Facebook profit from your data. They have no incentive to give you control of it.

climax.text: Self-sovereign identity could end the era of data breaches. If companies don't store your data, they can't leak it.

punchline.text: Your identity belongs to you. The technology to enforce that finally exists.

quiz.question: What is self-sovereign identity?
options: Individuals controlling their own identity data in a personal digital wallet
